category.simplystatus.name: SimplyStatus
key.simplystatus.OffHand: Show/hide item in the other hand
config.simplystatus.notConnected:
You are not connected to Discord!
Check your Internet connection and the presence of Discord on your computer
config.simplystatus.notConnectedLinux: If you have Discord installed through a third-party app store, like Flatpak, Snap, etc. Then look up RPC connectivity solutions, preferably about your app store and system in search engines
config.simplystatus.viewNameServer: Display server name from the list
config.simplystatus.OffHand: Displaying an item with the other hand
config.simplystatus.translate.mainMenu.s: The second line of the main menu
Second line of the main menu, but with music
config.simplystatus.translate.voice_two: You talk to the player next to you
config.simplystatus.translate.onFire.too: Would you like a cup of coffee?)
config.simplystatus.translate.disconnect: You have been disabled by the server
config.simplystatus.changeStatusNameInMi: Change the status name on Minecraft
config.simplystatus.addonsPresences.voic: Show that you have a mod for voice chat
config.simplystatus.addonsPresences.repl: Show that you are in ReplayMod

message.simplystatus.viewIP.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» The display of this server address has been disabled
message.simplystatus.viewStatic.true: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» Player stats display turned on
message.simplystatus.viewStatic.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» Player stats display disabled
message.simplystatus.viewName.true: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» Server name display was enabled
message.simplystatus.viewName.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» The server name display has been disabled
message.simplystatus.showTime.true: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» The status will now show how much you play
message.simplystatus.showTime.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» Now the status will not show how long you have played

message.simplystatus.bedrock.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» Displaying icons from Minecraft: Bedrock Edition is disabled

message.simplystatus.viewOffHand.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» The display of the object of the other hand is turned off
message.simplystatus.errorIsSinglePlayer: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» You can't use this in singleplayer!

message.simplystatus.username.false: Â§7SimplyStatusÂ§r Â» Your Discord nickname will now be displayed in the status
